titleStmt.title: The indifferent lover, or, The roving batchelor. To a pleasant new tune, sung in the last new comedy, called Amphytrion, or, Fond boy·

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ch[arles]. Bates, at the White-Hart in West-Smith-Field.,

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name, place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "For Iris I sigh and hourly dye ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
